items.text: A Song or Psalm of Asaph.
items.plainText: A Song or Psalm of Asaph.

items.text: Keep not thou silence, O God: hold not thy peace, and be not still, O God.
items.plainText: Keep not thou silence, O God: hold not thy peace, and be not still, O God.

items.text: For, lo, thine enemies make a tumult: and they that hate thee have lifted up the head.
items.plainText: For, lo, thine enemies make a tumult: and they that hate thee have lifted up the head.

items.text: They have taken crafty counsel against thy people, and consulted against thy hidden ones.
items.plainText: They have taken crafty counsel against thy people, and consulted against thy hidden ones.

items.text: They have said, Come, and let us cut them off from being a nation; that the name of Israel may be no more in remembrance.
items.plainText: They have said, Come, and let us cut them off from being a nation; that the name of Israel may be no more in remembrance.

items.text: For they have consulted together with one consent: they are confederate against thee:
items.plainText: For they have consulted together with one consent: they are confederate against thee:

items.text: The tabernacles of Edom, and the Ishmaelites; of Moab, and the Hagarenes;
items.plainText: The tabernacles of Edom, and the Ishmaelites; of Moab, and the Hagarenes;

items.text: Gebal, and Ammon, and Amalek; the Philistines with the inhabitants of Tyre;
items.plainText: Gebal, and Ammon, and Amalek; the Philistines with the inhabitants of Tyre;

items.text: Assur also is joined with them: they have holpen the children of Lot. Selah.
items.plainText: Assur also is joined with them: they have holpen the children of Lot. Selah.

items.text: Do unto them as unto the Midianites; as to Sisera, as to Jabin, at the brook of Kison:
items.plainText: Do unto them as unto the Midianites; as to Sisera, as to Jabin, at the brook of Kison:

items.text: Which perished at Endor: they became as dung for the earth.
items.plainText: Which perished at Endor: they became as dung for the earth.

items.text: Make their nobles like Oreb, and like Zeeb: yea, all their princes as Zebah, and as Zalmunna:
items.plainText: Make their nobles like Oreb, and like Zeeb: yea, all their princes as Zebah, and as Zalmunna:

items.text: Who said, Let us take to ourselves the houses of God in possession.
items.plainText: Who said, Let us take to ourselves the houses of God in possession.

items.text: O my God, make them like a wheel; as the stubble before the wind.
items.plainText: O my God, make them like a wheel; as the stubble before the wind.

items.text: As the fire burneth a wood, and as the flame setteth the mountains on fire;
items.plainText: As the fire burneth a wood, and as the flame setteth the mountains on fire;

items.text: So persecute them with thy tempest, and make them afraid with thy storm.
items.plainText: So persecute them with thy tempest, and make them afraid with thy storm.

items.text: Fill their faces with shame; that they may seek thy name, O LORD.
items.plainText: Fill their faces with shame; that they may seek thy name, O LORD.

items.text: Let them be confounded and troubled for ever; yea, let them be put to shame, and perish:
items.plainText: Let them be confounded and troubled for ever; yea, let them be put to shame, and perish:

items.text: That men may know that thou, whose name alone is JEHOVAH, art the most high over all the earth.
items.plainText: That men may know that thou, whose name alone is JEHOVAH, art the most high over all the earth.
